name: Punchy's Adventure
description:
Punchy's Adventure is an action side-scrolling platformer game about saving the princess! Created in Construct 2!

All art: GrafxKid on OpenGameArt.

Song: Happy Accident Simple Short Loop by Pugly on OpenGameArt.

Sound effects created in either SFXR or BFXR.

Controls:

Arrow Keys or WASD - Move

Up or W - Jump

Space - Punch

Created 11/19/16.

Check it out on GitHub!
